name: Mega virus game
description:
This game was created for an AIE (uni) solo assessment called 'Time to make a game'. I got help with programming from my father.

This game is a Side scroller space ship style shooter for PC, where the player plays as a mega virus that is attacking the human body. The player’s role is to reach the humans brains and destroy it. Along the way the player will encounter a variety white blood cells, antibiotics and bacteriophages all aimed at eliminating the player.
This game is targeted at people on pc, people who enjoy space invader like games, shooting games and Side scrollers.

Tools used: The tools that were used to make this game were: Photoshop, Microsoft Paint, Unity, Visual Studio, Maya and MasterpieceVR to do 3D sculpting.
